item.title: Setup Ansible on your Mac to connect to remote Windows Domain Servers/Workstations using secure Kerberos
item.description: Ansible supports authentication to Windows using NTLM over http (bad), NTLM over https (better) or Kerberos over HTTPS (best). Surprisingly it's the easiest to setup also, so no excuses. Ansible's documentation states that if your running in a domain environment, Kerberos should be used over NTLM. We're going to cover the following setup requirements, then we will throw a couple commands at Windows to prove we have successfully authed. Installing the requirements As i said, Kerberos is already installed on your Mac, so we just need to install the python winrm library.
